directions: In a large saucepan, melt butter over low heat. Stir in flour until smooth. Stir in onions, garlic, and ham; cook and stir until onion is soft.  Stir in tomatoes, and cook for 5 minutes.  Mix in oregano, rice, and broth. Cover, and simmer until just a little liquid remains.
Add shrimp, and stir to evenly distribute. Cook for 8 minutes, or until rice is cooked and shrimp turns pink.
ingredients: 1/4 cup cooked ham, cut into strips
title: Jambalaya With Shrimp
